body:
Comment 1: 
Cannot reproduce.

(11:46) jnml@fsc-r550:~/src/code.google.com/p/go.exp/fsnotify$ go test -v
=== RUN TestFsnotifyAttrib
--- PASS: TestFsnotifyAttrib (0.61 seconds)
